verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) In Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H2620>taken<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> Let me <S%H408>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> In Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me.

<S%H5186>Incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, <S%H5337>rescue<s%> me <S%H4120>quickly;<s%> Be Thou to me a <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H4581>strength,<s%> A <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
For Thou art my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress;<s%> For Thy name's <S%H4616>sake<s%> Thou wilt <S%H5148>lead<s%> me and <S%H5095>guide<s%> me.
Thou wilt <S%H3318>pull<s%> me out of the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they have <S%H2934>secretly<s%> <S%H2934>laid<s%> for me; For Thou art my <S%H4581>strength.<s%>
Into Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> I <S%H6485>commit<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> Thou hast <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> those who <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H1892>idols;<s%> But I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H834>Because<s%> Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

And Thou hast not <S%H5462>given<s%> me <S%H5462>over<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy;<s%> Thou hast <S%H5975>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in a <S%H4800>large<s%> <S%H4800>place.<s%>

Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for I am in <S%H9503>distress;<s%> My <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H6244>wasted<s%> <S%H6244>away<s%> from <S%H3708>grief,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> and my <S%H990>body<s%> [also.]

For my <S%H9132>life<s%> is <S%H3615>spent<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> And my <S%H8141>years<s%> with <S%H585>sighing;<s%> My <S%H3581>strength<s%> has <S%H3782>failed<s%> because of my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And my <S%H6106>body<s%> has <S%H6244>wasted<s%> <S%H6244>away.<s%>

<S%H4480>Because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6887>adversaries,<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> <S%H3966>Especially<s%> to my <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> And an <S%H6343>object<s%> of <S%H6343>dread<s%> to my <S%H3045>acquaintances;<s%> Those who <S%H7200>see<s%> me in the <S%H2351>street<s%> <S%H5074>flee<s%> from me.
I am <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> as a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H4191>man,<s%> out of <S%H3820>mind,<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> like a broken <S%H6>vessel.<s%>

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>slander<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> <S%H4032>Terror<s%> is on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side;<s%> While they <S%H3245>took<s%> <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, They <S%H2161>schemed<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> away my <S%H5315>life.<s%>
But as for me, I <S%H982>trust<s%> in Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> "Thou art my <S%H430>God.<s%>"
My <S%H6256>times<s%> are in Thy <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and from those who <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me.
Make Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon Thy <S%H5650>servant;<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me in Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>

Let me not be <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for I <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Thee; Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> let them be <S%H1826>silent<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

Let the <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> be <S%H481>dumb,<s%> Which <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6277>arrogantly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> With <S%H1346>pride<s%> and <S%H937>contempt.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> is Thy <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> Thou hast <S%H6845>stored<s%> up for those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee, Which Thou hast <S%H6466>wrought<s%> for those who <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Thee, <S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>

Thou dost <S%H5641>hide<s%> them in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H5643>place<s%> of Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> from the <S%H7407>conspiracies<s%> of <S%H376>man;<s%> Thou dost <S%H6845>keep<s%> them <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in a <S%H5521>shelter<s%> from the <S%H7379>strife<s%> of <S%H3956>tongues.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> For He has <S%H6381>made<s%> <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to me in a <S%H4692>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

As for me, I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H2648>alarm,<s%> "I am <S%H1629>cut<s%> <S%H1629>off<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>"; <S%H403>Nevertheless<s%> Thou didst <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%> When I <S%H7768>cried<s%> to Thee.

O <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones!<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5341>preserves<s%> the <S%H539>faithful,<s%> And <S%H5921>fully<s%> <S%H3499><s%> <S%H9608>recompenses<s%> the <S%H1346>proud<s%> <S%H6213>doer.<s%>
Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and let your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H553>take<s%> <S%H553>courage,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> you who <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
